Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Thank you for registering for the upcoming Pivotal Cloud Platform Roadshow in India. Please find the event details below:
Date: Thursday, December 4, 2014 Time: 9.30 for registration with 10am start, Seminar 10am-11.00am, Workshop 11am-5pm Location: EMC India COE, Bagmane World Technology Center - SEZ, KR Puram Hobli, Bangalore 560048, Karnataka
{{my.Save the Date - India:default=edit me}}
Prior to the event, please create an account on Pivotal Network <https://network.pivotal.io/>. To fully participate in the workshop, bring your laptop with wireless connectivity enabled.
Questions? Please contact us via email <mailto:pivotal-operations@pivotal.io> or visit our website <http://www.pivotal.io>.
Thank you, The Pivotal Team
